cair.graph

Class Edge

  • java.lang.Object
    • cair.graph.Edge

  • public class Edge
extends java.lang.Object
    An edge in the flow graph

      • Edge

        public Edge(int from,
            int to,
            int capacity,
            int used)
        Construct an edge of the flow graph
        Parameters:
        from - Origin vertex of the edge
        to - Destination vertex of the edge
        capacity - Capacity of the edge
        used - Used flow of the edge
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - capacity < 0
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - used < 0
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - used > capacity

        public void fill(int used)
        Increment the used flow of the edge
        Parameters:
        used - The incrementation value to the used flow
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - used < 0

        See Also:

      • isFree

        public boolean isFree()
        Check if the edge is saturated or not The edge is not saturated if the used flow of the edge is lower to the capacity.
        Returns:
        true if the edge is not saturated, false otherwise
        See Also:
        getCapacity(), getUsed()
